name: Mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CIT; CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (MIT; CAS Reg. No. 2682-20-4), at a ratio of 3 parts to 1 part by weight, optionally stabilized with magnesium or sodium nitrate and copper (II) nitrate.
FoodContactSubstance: Mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CIT; CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (MIT; CAS Reg. No. 2682-20-4), at a ratio of 3 parts to 1 part by weight, optionally stabilized with magnesium or sodium nitrate and copper (II) nitrate.
